title: All Ball - New Pay For Play Law Gets It Wrong; NBA Workout Guru Rob McClanaghan Talks Training Steph, KD, LeBron
itunes:title: All Ball - New Pay For Play Law Gets It Wrong; NBA Workout Guru Rob McClanaghan Talks Training Steph, KD, LeBron
description:
This week, Gottlieb explains why he's opposed to the recently passed California legislation that aims to pay college players for their names and likeness, and talks with NBA workout guru to the stars Rob McClanaghan about his path from Syracuse walk-on to training NBA superstars like Russell Westbrook, Kevin Durant, LeBron and Steph Curry. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
